CHALLENGE.SPONSORED_CHALLENGE_UPLOADING_MODAL_TEXT:

CHALLENGE.WANT_TO_PARTICIPATE: Would you like to take part in this challenge?
CHALLENGE.UPLOADING_PARTICIPATION_VIDEO: We are uploading your challenge üöÄ. Your challenge will be reviewed and you'll be notified regarding it. Please do not close the app until the red bar at the top disappears üôè
CHALLENGE.CREATE_GLOBAL_CHALLENGE_DESCRIPTION: Global Challenges are accessible to all users and are prominently displayed on the Challenges page. Participation in these challenges is open to any user possessing the requisite number of Muscle Coins.
CHALLENGE.CREATE_SPONSORED_CHALLENGE_DESCRIPTION: Sponsored Challenges are tailored for businesses aiming to promote their products or services. These challenges are featured in a dedicated Sponsored Challenges section.
CHALLENGE.CHALLENGE_PAYMENT_MODAL_TEXT:
Please click on the 'Pay now' button to complete your payment. Once the payment is successfully made, you will be notified about the status of your challenge.
After completion of the payment, no further action is required on your part. We will take care of everything else and keep you updated on the progress of your challenge.

ADMIN.REJECT_CHALLENGE_TITLE: Explain why you are rejecting this challenge

DESCRIPTION.APP: Join our vibrant community! Download our mobile app or use the web3 application. Connect, engage, and experience more with us.
DESCRIPTION.MUSCLE_COIN_LONG: Muscle Coin, the currency of the PullApp ecosystem, is designed to reward your gains. Earn, win, and spend it all within the app. Strengthen your fitness journey with every rep!
DESCRIPTION.MUSCLE_COIN: Your Fitness Currency. Earn, Win, Spend in the PullApp Ecosystem.
DESCRIPTION.WHITEPAPER: Comprehensive Guide to Our Vision, Technology, and the Unique Value of Muscle Coin in the PullApp Ecosystem.
DESCRIPTION.BUSINESS_LONG: Enhance your services and increase profitability by incorporating PullApp into your business operations.
DESCRIPTION.BUSINESS_EVENTS: Enhance Your Business with PullApp events
DESCRIPTION.MARKETPLACE: Sell fitness equipment, supplements, and more in the PullApp Marketplace.
DESCRIPTION.COMPANY_LONG: PullApp is a dedicated social platform where street athletes converge, connect and grow. It's the go-to destination for sharing workouts, celebrating progress, and exploring the vibrant world of street athletics.
DESCRIPTION.ABOUT_US: We are a vibrant tech company fostering a connected street athletics community via our innovative platform
DESCRIPTION.CONTACT_US: Reach out to us for any queries or feedback.

COMMON.DROP_FILE_TO_ATTACH: Drop files to Attach, or browse
